summary: Goldman Sachs is a big American company that helps with money and banking. It was started in 1869 and is based in New York City. The company does many things like giving advice on buying and selling companies, helping with loans, and managing money for rich people. It also trades stocks and bonds for clients and makes its own investments. Goldman Sachs is one of the most important banks in the world and is very rich, ranking high on lists of the biggest companies.
title: Goldman Sachs
